context: Tests whether the agent writes a deck-building script that follows the skill's specific python-pptx patterns: template stripping via drop_rel, speaker notes via python-pptx (not MCP), footer on every slide, layout selection from profile, and background color strategy.

checklist.name: Template stripping code
checklist.description: Script includes the template slide-stripping pattern: iterating slides._sldIdLst, getting rId, calling part.drop_rel(rId), and removing sldId elements

checklist.name: Speaker notes via python-pptx
checklist.description: Script injects speaker notes using python-pptx (slide.notes_slide.notes_text_frame.text = ...), NOT via an MCP tool call or placeholder

checklist.name: Notes batch injection
checklist.description: Speaker notes are injected as a batch operation AFTER all slides are created (not interleaved with slide creation), using a notes_map or similar pattern

checklist.name: Footer on every slide
checklist.description: The script adds a footer text element to every slide (not just some), using position/font data from the profile

checklist.name: Layout selection from profile
checklist.description: The script selects slide layouts by index from the profile's template_layouts array (matching slide type to layout use_for), not by hardcoded layout names

checklist.name: No adjacent color repeat
checklist.description: Background color assignment logic ensures no two adjacent slides share the same color (checking previous slide's color before selecting)

checklist.name: White/black reserved
checklist.description: White or black/transparent backgrounds are only assigned to full-bleed image or meme slides, with colored backgrounds for all other slide types

checklist.name: No slide numbers
checklist.description: The script does NOT add slide numbers (or explicitly respects the 'never' setting from the profile)

checklist.name: Uses python-pptx library
checklist.description: The script imports and uses python-pptx (from pptx import Presentation) as the primary library

checklist.name: Footer color adaptation
checklist.description: Footer text color adapts based on background color (e.g., white text on dark backgrounds, dark text on light backgrounds)

checklist.name: Deck plan document
checklist.description: The deck_plan.md maps each outline slide to a specific layout index and describes the build decisions
